column1: Sucy–Bonneuil is a railway station on RER train network in Sucy-en-Brie
Sucy–Bonneuil station used to be served by the Bastille railway line (Paris Bastille – Marles-en-Brie)
column2: which has been running from 1872 to 1969. It is now served by RER line A.

column1: The station is served by a train every 10 minutes at off-peek time in both directions
column2: and by around 1 train every 15 minutes at late evening and early morning.

column1: The station is served by several buses:
Noctilien network night bus line: N32 (between Paris (Gare de Lyon) and Boissy-Saint-Léger) ;
